data.title: Niall Horan Drops 3rd Studio Album 'The Show,' Reveals How Girlfriend Reacted to Songs About Her
data.meta_description: Niall Horan's third album The Show has just been released on Friday (June 9)! The 29-year-old former One Direction singer ...
data.meta_site_name: Niall Horan Drops 3rd Studio Album ‘The Show,’ Reveals How Girlfriend Reacted to Songs About Her | First Listen, Music, Niall Horan : Just Jared Jr.
data.text:
Niall Horan‘s third album The Show has just been released on Friday (June 9)!

The 29-year-old former One Direction singer debuted his latest solo effort, and even released the music video for the album’s title track, which was the first song written for the LP.

Recently, Niall opened up about how his girlfriend Amelia Woolley reacted to the love songs written about her.

See what he shared and check out the video and album inside…

“Usually it’s the love songs are heartbreak songs, so it’s nice to be able to write better, you know, more happier stuff,” Niall told ET Canada about the love songs on this album.

He adds of Amelia‘s reaction, “I think she’s just like, what? Really? She’s like, taken aback, I suppose.”

ICYMI: See what he said about his being his best album to date.

Don’t forget, Niall is going on tour in 2024 in support of The Show – See all the dates!
